I love reading...I like quotes and girly stuff...

Fan of the Cut & Run Serie & MM romance. 

Also a Black Dagger Brotherhood addict and a THIRDs nerds.

Sometimes NSFW, so be warned...

Multifandom blog - Hate free blog. 
Multi shipper - Ship all the ships...No drama zone.

blog.name: amarvelfangirlthings
blog.title: Marvel
blog.description: Just Your Average Marvel Fan Girl :)

summary: I know we all think about how Tony and Aunt May feel with Peter fading...
body:
I know we all think about how Tony and Aunt May feel with Peter fading…

But what about Happy?

Assuming he didn’t fade….I wonder how he felt about Peter Parker’s death.

Do you think he goes back over the old voicemails Peter used to leave on his phone?

reblog.comment:

blog.name: starspangleyimagines
blog.title: Steve Rogers x Reader Posts
blog.description:
I'm 19 and I write stuff.
I do take requests and you are more than welcome to submit to my askbox or message me directly. 
main acc: michellekeehlmello

title: Nightmare
body:
This one was requested by the lovely @littlemissglitched who asked:         Hi can you write an imagine where the reader is crying against the wall because she had a nightmare and Steve comforts her? But alot of fluff please 🤗🤗🤗🤗 thanks 

For me personally, the most terrifying thing that could ever happen is being underwater in a dream and drowning. 

I hope you like it :) xoxo

You were a great swimmer all your life. You loved water and loved to be at the beach during the summers you spent with your family.

But this time it was different. Something was really off.

You didn’t remember how or when you got there, or when. Just that something was wrong. You were under water and it was really dark. The only light piercing through underneath the dark surface was the pale glow the moon gave and it wasn’t much. You looked up, towards the surface and began to swim up. It didn’t work— you stayed exactly where you were.

Something was moving in the dark. Once again, you were completely clueless as to what it was, but you hoped and told a silent prayer that it wouldn’t harm you.  Suddenly, a huge white tail surrounded you. Unable to move, you stared at it in shock. The tail moved in front of you, and from the darkness a creature’s face appeared. It had no eyes, no ears, no nose, only a huge mouth. It had two giant arms with thin, pointy fingers.

”Y/N.”, it cooed. How did it even know your name? ”I know what you did.”, the creature was smiling now, its’ yellow and dangerously sharp teeth showing. ”All those people who were sacrificed to make you who you are today.”

You tried to open your mouth, but it was of no use. ”Look at them Y/N!”, the creature grumbled. One of its’ hands was around you now, the other one pointing towards something. ”I said look at them!”, it roared. You did as you were told, you looked. There were people floating in the water, people you knew. All people who ever meant something to you.

”You made this! This was YOUR fault!”
Water was entering through your nose now and you looked at the creature in panic. ”That’s right Y/N. Pay for what you’ve done!”, the grip it had tightened around your waist. ”Suffer, like they did.”

You looked up to see your best friend’s lifeless body. They stared right at you with cold, dead eyes. The water was burning your chest as it entered your lungs and soon enough everything around you went black.

You woke up with sweat dripping off your forehead with a heart throbbing, feeling like someone was pounding your chest with a hammer with every heart beat. You got up from your bed, walking across the dark room, still shocked about the dream you just had. You went to open your bedroom door but ended up falling to the floor with a huge thud. You looked up towards the door and crawled to the wall, where you eventually curled up and started to cry.

You didn’t know how long you have been there when there were a few loud taps on your door. You didn’t bother to answer the door, so the person on the other side opened the door.
”Y/N? Darling, what’s wrong?”, Steve asked softly. You looked up at him, eyes puffy and filled with tears. ”It’s nothing, I will be alright.”, you sniffled and managed to dry your tears in your sleeve.

”Hey.”, he said and sat down next to you. He took your hand. ”It’s okay if you don’t want to tell me, but I get worried when you’re up in the middle of the night, crying. But please at least let me stay here with you during the night so I know you’re okay.”, he said as he squeezed your hand. You started crying again. Steve got closer to you, and brought you into his arms. He was wearing a long-sleeved, tight blue shirt which was made of a soft fabric. ”I’m here.”, he whispered and caressed your back. ”You’re safe.”

”They all died because of me! I was supposed to die, like the creature said!”, you sobbed.

”What creature?”, Steve’s eyebrows knitted together. You continued to sob into his chest. ”Darling, what creature?”

”The one in my dream! It held me tight around my waist and showed me everyone that has died around me. It said it was my fault, and for that I was gonna pay. So I drowned.”, you wept, barely being able to breathe from being too upset.

”Breathe doll, breathe. Please.”, he hushed. ”Breathe with me okay? Breathe in.”, his chest raised up and you shakily inhaled too. ”And out.”, his chest now lowered and so did yours. ”You’re doing great darling, let’s do it again.”

And so you did, a few more times.

”Thank you.”, you mumbled tiredly.

”It’s completely alright. I’m staying with you tonight.”, he said as he continued to caress your back. You just nodded.

”Alright darling, let’s go to bed.”, Steve murmured as he kissed the top of your head. He helped you up and led you to bed.

He tucked you in and got under the covers next to you and you cuddled into him. ”Thank you darling, honestly.”, you said as you pecked his lips.

”Don’t mention it, doll.”, he said softly as he kissed you once more. ”Get some sleep.”

”Y/N? Darling, what’s wrong?”, Steve asked softly. You looked up at him, eyes puffy and filled with tears. ”It’s nothing, I will be alright.”, you sniffled and managed to dry your tears in your sleeve.

”Hey.”, he said and sat down next to you. He took your hand. ”It’s okay if you don’t want to tell me, but I get worried when you’re up in the middle of the night, crying. But please at least let me stay here with you during the night so I know you’re okay.”, he said as he squeezed your hand. You started crying again. Steve got closer to you, and brought you into his arms. He was wearing a long-sleeved, tight blue shirt which was made of a soft fabric. ”I’m here.”, he whispered and caressed your back. ”You’re safe.”

”They all died because of me! I was supposed to die, like the creature said!”, you sobbed.

”What creature?”, Steve’s eyebrows knitted together. You continued to sob into his chest. ”Darling, what creature?”

”The one in my dream! It held me tight around my waist and showed me everyone that has died around me. It said it was my fault, and for that I was gonna pay. So I drowned.”, you wept, barely being able to breathe from being too upset.

”Breathe doll, breathe. Please.”, he hushed. ”Breathe with me okay? Breathe in.”, his chest raised up and you shakily inhaled too. ”And out.”, his chest now lowered and so did yours. ”You’re doing great darling, let’s do it again.”

And so you did, a few more times.

”Thank you.”, you mumbled tiredly.

”It’s completely alright. I’m staying with you tonight.”, he said as he continued to caress your back. You just nodded.

”Alright darling, let’s go to bed.”, Steve murmured as he kissed the top of your head. He helped you up and led you to bed.

He tucked you in and got under the covers next to you and you cuddled into him. ”Thank you darling, honestly.”, you said as you pecked his lips.

”Don’t mention it, doll.”, he said softly as he kissed you once more. ”Get some sleep.”

summary: Has it ever occurred to anyone that Quentin Quire basically just created the “[Insert name here] was Right” meme for the X-Men...
caption: Has it ever occurred to anyone that Quentin Quire basically just created the “[Insert name here] was Right” meme for the X-Men fandom. Like… he did that. Even better? He did it just to piss off Charles Xavier and honestly what an icon.

summary: What Do Marvel Fans Call Themselves?
title: What Do Marvel Fans Call Themselves?
body: So I’ve been wondering what Marvel fans call themselves lately. I asked some of my friends and they said they don’t know. So can I suggest that we be called “Marvelites”? Reblog if you agree.

reblog.comment: So I’ve been wondering what Marvel fans call themselves lately. I asked some of my friends and they said they don’t know. So can I suggest that we be called “Marvelites”? Reblog if you agree.

trail.content_raw: So I’ve been wondering what Marvel fans call themselves lately. I asked some of my friends and they said they don’t know. So can I suggest that we be called “Marvelites”? Reblog if you agree.
trail.content: So I’ve been wondering what Marvel fans call themselves lately. I asked some of my friends and they said they don’t know. So can I suggest that we be called “Marvelites”? Reblog if you agree.
